tweet:
The @Beaconjournal is right. 

We need to come together to address the affordable housing crisis impacting communities across Ohio. 

The #EvictionCrisisAct will help prevent avoidable evictions, reduce homelessness & empower people to escape poverty. https://www.beaconjournal.com/opinion/20200111/editorial-itrsquos-time-to-address-our-eviction-crisis …

Why is this trade agreement with Mexico and Canada so important?

Because they are #Ohio’s biggest trading partners and the #USMCA particularly helps farmers, manufacturers, snd auto workers, all of special importance to Ohio. pic.twitter.com/VN7z21Oc38

Major Joe Renner’s lifelong service to the Preble County community is both commendable and inspiring. 

I congratulate him on his well-deserved retirement and wish him all the best moving forward. https://www.registerherald.com/news/36193/renner-retires-from-pcso …

American workers, farmers, & business owners can out-compete and out-innovate anyone in the world. All we ask for is fair and reciprocal treatment from our trading partners. 

The #ChinaTradeDeal is a significant step in the right direction. pic.twitter.com/rM2o5g1aDJ

I enjoyed my visit w/ members from the Warren County United Way on Friday. 

We had a productive discussion about ensuring Ohioans get the skills training they need for the #jobs available today. 

My #JOBSAct will help make that training more accessible & affordable for Ohioans. https://twitter.com/senrobportman/status/1218256324942880771 …

Pleased the Senate finally voted to extend the federal ban on fentanyl-related substances - at least until May 2021. 

But temporary action isn't enough. These are some of the deadliest drugs in the US. My bipartisan legislation will permanently ban them. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8t7mm …

Appreciate the support from Franklin County’s Human Service Chamber & Board of Commissioners for my Eviction Crisis Act which will address the fact that families in Franklin County are being squeezed by rising rents & a lack of affordable housing. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8tnp5 …

Pleased the Senate passed my resolution to mark the 75th anniversary of the Warsaw Uprising and honor the thousands of courageous Poles who rose up against the German Nazis occupying Warsaw. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8suls …

For decades, America’s trade relationship with China has lacked equity, durability, & balance.

@realDonaldTrump phase one trade deal will begin to level the playing field for US workers, address China’s unfair trade practices & provide a big economic boost for our farmers. pic.twitter.com/rM2o5g1aDJ

#USMCA includes a first-of-its-kind digital trade chapter that will make it easier for small businesses in #Ohio and across the nation to sell their products and services online. 

This trade deal will bring American commerce into the 21st century. pic.twitter.com/ihSntnC0Kn

I’m proud of the way the Beavercreek community had come together to help with the recovery and relief efforts after the Memorial Day tornadoes. 

Pleased to visit again today and get a full update from City Manager Pete Landrum and Mayor Bob Stone. pic.twitter.com/zQP2CB2r6D

I’m grateful that Congress approved my measure last fall to reauthorize funding for Dayton’s NAHA through Sept. 30, 2022. 

@visit_NAHA is home to our nation’s aviation history & I'm proud of the progress we have made to ensure it is preserved & protected. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/b9f0p/8tk6i …

Enjoyed visiting Dayton’s National Aviation Heritage Area this morning for a roundtable discussion focusing on our efforts to maintain & preserve these cultural sites & history of the Wright brothers so they can be enjoyed by future generations. Thanks for having me @visit_NAHA! pic.twitter.com/anu78HrFt6

#USMCA will provide American farmers, workers & businesses with a more level playing field and greater market access to #Ohio’s biggest trading partners, Mexico & Canada. 

This is a good deal that will grow our economy & create thousands of #jobs in Ohio and across the country. pic.twitter.com/1oqCSAZOUM

Great visit today with the leadership at Brain Brew Custom Whiskey in Cincinnati. We discussed how their company will be able to thrive thanks to the recent extension of the tax relief I fought to have included in the 2017 #TaxReform. pic.twitter.com/88o3s4fdXs

Great visit today w/ the Raleigh Family & Sheriff Si Leis to learn more about Madi’s House, which is designed to provide a supporting community to help adults maintain their recovery. So proud of the Raleigh family for channeling their grief into an org benefiting the community. pic.twitter.com/NKhvgr8rjE

This morning I spent some time at @FeconInc with members from the Warren County @UnitedWay talking about #jobs training & trade.  

Enjoyed hearing about their new innovative program to prepare students for well-paying manufacturing jobs. ▶ https://www.portman.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/lebanon-portman-highlights-trade-victories-participates-workforce … pic.twitter.com/4rxQLY30EA

Today the Senate voted to extend the ban on fentanyl-related substances for 18 months.

But temporary action is not enough. These are some of the deadliest drugs in the US. They must be permanently banned. I have legislation to do just that.
 https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8t7mm …

A lot of politicians & pundits are debating who won the #USMCA negotiations. 

In my view, thanks to the hard work of @realDonaldTrump & Ambassador Lighthizer, the winner here is the American people.  

This is a great deal for folks in #Ohio & across the nation. pic.twitter.com/jzJWJL1jUL

#USMCA includes a cutting-edge digital trade chapter that will bring North American commerce into the 21st Century.

This will help make #Ohio’s small businesses' online sales easier and boost #jobs and our economy. pic.twitter.com/jCHhyxmrzX

The Senate just passed #USMCA by 89-10 vote. This new trade agreement will grow the economy, create 176k+ new #jobs, expand exports & raise wages for American workers.

Well done @RealDonaldTrump & @USTR. This is a good deal that will benefit folks in #Ohio & across the country. pic.twitter.com/4ps8oMotuq

The Senate’s strong bipartisan approval of #USMCA is good news for #Ohio & the country.
 
USMCA will create 176k+ new #jobs, expand markets for farmers, revitalize manufacturing, and make online sales easier for Ohio #SmallBiz. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/b9f0p/8t5x7 …

This is a big week for trade! @RealDonaldTrump signed the #ChinaTradeDeal earlier today and the Senate will vote to pass #USMCA tomorrow.
 
These are equitable & balanced agreements that will benefit American workers, businesses, farmers & consumers. #Jobs https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CkGoK_fBjEI&feature=youtu.be …

Enjoyed catching up with Frank Burkett of the @OhioFarmBureau at the @WhiteHouse signing ceremony for the phase one deal today. 

The #ChinaTradeDeal secures $50B in new ag purchase commitments. That's great news for #Ohio farmers! pic.twitter.com/Kq4gXpkucI

The #ChinaTradeDeal includes enforceable protections that will level the playing field and address the trade imbalances that have hurt American workers & businesses for decades. #Jobs pic.twitter.com/cyk22Ijm07

The Phase One agreement @RealDonaldTrump just signed is a good first step toward bringing equity, durability & balance to the economic relationship between the world’s two largest economies. #ChinaTradeDeal #Jobs 
 
More in my op-ed for @barronsonline 👇 https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8sv0d …

Well done @RealDonaldTrump & @USTR. This new trade agreement is a good 1st step towards a healthier, more lasting US-China relationship.
 
It will level the playing field for American workers, open new markets for US products & better protect American innovators. #ChinaTradeDeal

Proud to join @SenateForeign in the overwhelmingly bipartisan approval of #USMCA. 

USMCA will bolster US manufacturing, expand market access, and create a more level playing field for US workers, farmers & service providers. #jobs

The Senate must come together and pass my bipartisan legislation to permanently ban these lethal drugs. This lifesaving legislation will help keep this deadly poison from spreading even further. https://youtu.be/VmG7Zc-DAsI
In 23 days, the federal ban on deadly fentanyl-related substances will expire. We cannot allow that to happen.

To the people of Iran: we are with you. 

America stands with you.

Our arguments are not with you, they’re with your government. pic.twitter.com/A3OUXeF9nA

Pleased to see GM & LG Chem announcing a site for their new, state-of-the-art battery cell plant in Lordstown. 

I’m hopeful this new investment will be the beginning of a sustained, long-term commitment to the region that will continue to grow over time.

USMCA will create 176k+ new #jobs, expand markets for farmers, revitalize American manufacturing & grow the economy by $68B. 

This is a good deal for folks in #Ohio & across the country.  

We've waited long enough. It’s time to get #USMCA across the finish line. pic.twitter.com/lo15LqyL2J

Productive mtg w/ Amb @TerryBranstad regarding the federal ban on fentanyl-related substances expiring on Feb 6. We agree this is a top priority & must be addressed quickly. 

Congress must pass my bipartisan bill to permanently ban these drugs. Thousands of lives are at stake. pic.twitter.com/NwbKG47vvc

In 23 days, some of the nation's deadliest drugs will become legal when the current order criminalizing them expires. 
 
These fentanyl-related substances are fueling the addiction crisis.
 
Congress must permanently ban these drugs. My #FightFentanylAct will do just that.

Today’s @Beaconjournal editorial highlighted my new bill to address the affordable housing crisis impacting communities across #Ohio.
 
The #EvictionCrisisAct will help prevent avoidable evictions, reduce homelessness & empower people to escape poverty. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8sb5h …

My Fallen Warrior Battlefield Cross Memorial Act, which has now been signed into law, will ensure that fallen American heroes buried in #Ohio and across the nation can be honored with replicas of the Battlefield Cross. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8rayq …

This week, I joined my colleagues on the Senate Finance Committee in strongly approving #USMCA. 

This new bipartisan trade agreement will expand markets and create more than 176,000 #jobs. 

At a @SenFinance cmte hearing earlier this week, I highlighted my support: pic.twitter.com/AYCtHMtl4v

My bipartisan #FIGHTFentanyl Act will permanently criminalize fentanyl-related substances so we can help keep these deadly drugs out of our communities. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8r131 …
As the @WashingtonPost editorial board highlights, we must continue to fight the deadly influx of fentanyl-related substances in the U.S. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8r131 …

As @WEWS reports, there is a resurgence of cocaine addiction in #Ohio communities. 

My Combating Meth & Cocaine Act, which was recently signed into law, provides flexibility for state officials to address the growing problem. https://www.news5cleveland.com/news/local-news/stimulants-on-the-rise-in-ohio …

The #JOBSAct is a top priority of mine in 2020. 

This bipartisan legislation will help #Ohioans prepare for the #jobs available today by bolstering access to skills-based training programs. 

Let’s get the #JOBSAct done this year. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8s5om …

We accomplished a lot for #Ohioans in 2019. 

In my column for @NReflector, I highlight a few of my legislative wins & how I will continue to work for #Ohio in 2020. https://www.norwalkreflector.com/frontpage/2020/01/07/Rob-Portman-Much-accomplished-in-2019.html?ci=stream&lp=1&p=1 …

NAFTA is 25 years old & isn’t suited for a world where people shop online, communicate over email, and conduct banking transactions online. 

That is one reason we need to enact #USMCA, a modernized trade agreement that will bring our economy into the 21st century. #jobs

It’s been more than a year since @realDonaldTrump signed #USMCA, a new trade agreement that will create 176k+ #jobs, expand markets for farmers, revitalize manufacturing & grow the economy by $68B. 

This is a good deal for Ohioans & all Americans. 

It’s time to get USMCA done.

In 26 days, several types of deadly fentanyl-related substances will no longer be illegal. 

Congress must pass my bi-partisan #FIGHTFentanyl Act to keep these deadly drugs out of our communities. 
 https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8r131 …

There’s a way forward for #Iran to rejoin the international community rather than continue to be a pariah and the top sponsor of state terrorism in the world. 

The U.S. is willing to negotiate with Iran if they cease their belligerent actions in the region and come to the table. pic.twitter.com/dXz9bnza7G

Starting October 1st #Ohioans will need to have a REAL ID in order to board a domestic flight. 

Find your closest @Ohio_BMV location here:  https://ohiobmv.gov/87.aspx  pic.twitter.com/wabEFtGqP2

As I recently told @REI, there are few things I enjoy more than spending quality time outdoors. 

That’s why I’m working to protect our national parks & address the long-delayed maintenance needs through the bipartisan Restore Our Parks legislation. #ROPA https://www.rei.com/blog/news/representing-the-outdoors-senator-rob-portman …
My #SESTA law has helped by shutting down websites that knowingly facilitated selling girls and women online. The fight continues, and I continue to work to #EndItNow.
January is National Slavery and Human Trafficking Prevention Month. In this country, in this century, this horrific crime cannot continue.

The new sanctions on #Iran announced by @SecPompeo & @USTreasury @StevenMnuchin1 are an appropriate response to Iran’s recent attack on US & allied forces. 
 
I fully support @realDonaldTrump’s maximum pressure campaign to counter Iranian aggression.

Good News: Today’s #JobsReport shows that the American economy continues to grow!

▶️ 145k new #jobs created
▶️ Labor force expanded by 209,000
▶️ 3.5% unemployment rate (lowest in 50 years) https://www.wsj.com/articles/december-jobs-report-11578657600?mod=e2tw …

The killing of Suleimani was legitimate and justified. 
 
This was a ruthless terrorist responsible for the deaths of 600+ American service members and injuring thousands more. 
 
The world is a better place without him. pic.twitter.com/PUDe1pDEa1

We all owe our law enforcement officers a great debt of gratitude for the dangers they face and the sacrifices they make for the safety and security of families across Ohio and the nation.

To all those serving on the #ThinBlueLine, thank you for your service to our communities. pic.twitter.com/WddCBXfyTz

Pleased that my Fallen Warrior Battlefield Cross Memorial Act with @RepAGonzalez & @SenSherrodBrown is now law.

The Battlefield Cross can now be placed at the gravesites of fallen soldiers to serve as a powerful reminder of the cost of freedom. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/18ce5471smi/8rayq …

I will continue to fight for #Ohioans in 2020. More in my column for @SalemNewsOH: 

 https://www.salemnews.net/opinion/local-columns/2020/01/looking-back-at-the-2019-accomplishments/ …

We accomplished a lot for #Ohio in 2019. 

In addition to enhancing #job creation & improving retirement security, we also passed legislation to support #Ohio’s military installations, combat the addiction epidemic, increase cybersecurity & more.

As I said on the Senate floor earlier today, I applaud @RealDonaldTrump‘s strategy of “peace through strength” in response to Iranian aggression.

We don’t want war with Iran but we will never stand idly by when Americans are targeted. https://youtu.be/TtPDNbDpkfE
More from @WEWS: https://www.news5cleveland.com/news/local-news/stimulants-on-the-rise-in-ohio …

First responders & communities around Ohio tell me they are seeing a resurgence of meth & cocaine addiction.
 
We must address this crisis head-on.
 
My Combating Meth & Cocaine Law provides flexibility for state officials to address the issue...but there’s more work to be done.
In 2018, Fentanyl killed at least 30,000 Americans. We need these deadly drugs off our streets & out of our communities. We must pass my #FIGHTFentanyl Act now.

Important read from @WashingtonPost highlighting the need to permanently criminalize deadly fentanyl-related substances before the current scheduling order expires on February 6. 

My bipartisan #FIGHTFentanylAct does just that. https://cards.twitter.com/cards/b9f0p/8r80c …
Iran’s latest attacks on US military bases in Iraq are a continuation of a reckless and provocative policy. Our prayers are with our brave service members forward deployed in harm’s way.

#USMCA will help #Ohioans like Sharon and Gary in Columbus, #Ohio expand their budding eBay business and that’s a big reason why I’m pleased #USMCA was approved by the @SenFinance cmte today. USMCA is great for #Ohio and great for our nation. #jobs https://twitter.com/ebaymainstreet/status/1214614903434153988 …

A vote for #USMCA is a vote for improved market access, more US manufacturing & a more level playing field for US workers, farmers, and service providers. I urge my colleagues in the Senate to join me in supporting it when it reaches the Senate floor. #jobs

#USMCA expands market access for #Ohio farm products, incentivizes more auto production in the state & makes online sales easier for Ohio companies. I applaud @POTUS @USTradeRep Lighthizer for their persistence & determination to finalize this historic new trade agreement. #jobs

By opening more markets, it is good for US workers, farmers & manufacturers & will create thousands of new #jobs here in the US. #USMCA is particularly good for #Ohio as our 2 top trading partners are Canada & Mexico.

The @SenFinance Cmte’s strong bipartisan approval of #USMCA is good news for #Ohio & the US & an important step forward in our efforts to secure passage by the full Senate. #USMCA is a significant improvement over the status quo of NAFTA.  https://bit.ly/2ZWhO3N  #jobs

This morning in @SenFinance, I’m joining my colleagues to discuss #USMCA. This trade agreement will help level the playing field for workers, manufacturers & farmers with #Ohio’s two biggest trading partners and I look forward to getting it approved. You can watch it live below: https://twitter.com/SenFinance/status/1214550620633542661 …
I’m confident that we can continue to make progress on these & other issues in 2020. My top priority will continue to be delivering results for #Ohio.  https://bit.ly/36vR2l4

We also must do more on retirement security, which is why I’ve introduced the Retirement Security & Savings Act. Finally, I’m working to ensure the Senate passes #USMCA, which will expand markets & level the playing field for #Ohio workers, farmers & #smallbiz owners.

This year, I will continue to be an independent voice for #Ohio fighting for common-sense solutions to benefit our state. That includes working to pass my bipartisan #JOBSAct, which will help #Ohioans afford the skills training necessary for the #jobs available today.

…bolster efforts to protect our environment, including our #GreatLakes & national parks, combat the drug addiction epidemic, make health care more affordable and accessible & increase cybersecurity.  https://bit.ly/36vR2l4

I’m proud of the accomplishments we made in 2019 to address the real challenges facing #Ohioans. I worked to support economic growth, #job creation, greater retirement security, support #Ohio’s military installations…
https://bit.ly/2MetDfQ

We must all stand against these senseless & evil attacks. I’m proud the Nonprofit Security Grant Program received the $90M in funding for the rest of FY 2020 which I fought for to give our religious communities here in America have the resources they need to be safe.
Hate has no place in #Ohio & no place in America. I stand with the Jewish community and will continue to fight anti-Semitism in all its forms and from all sources. #JewishandProud
https://bit.ly/345yZAk

I’m grateful for the support from @OhioAG Dave Yost & all 56 state and territorial Attorneys General for the #FIGHTFentanylAct. They understand the urgency of passing this legislation so we can permanently protect all Americans from deadly fentanyl-related substances.

Last year, I introduced the #FIGHTFentanylAct to permanently criminalize these deadly substances to bolster our efforts to keep fentanyl-related substances out of our communities. I urge my colleagues to support this important legislation before the order expires next month.

On February 6, 2020 the scheduling order to criminalize fentanyl-related substances – is set to expire. This important order has allowed federal law enforcement authorities to bring criminal actions against individuals who manufacture, distribute, or handle these deadly drugs.

Glad to see the news of additional Fuyao investment in #Dayton this morning. The $46M project will bring in 100 new #jobs. @JobsOhio @MikeDeWine https://www.daytondailynews.com/business/gov-dewine-visits-fuyao-this-morning-for-announcement/5MbRV75ifaLzme7VhjyXRL/ …

As I recently highlighted on the @Senatefloor, we need to pass #USMCA to strengthen our economy & support #Ohio’s farmers & manufacturers and I’m confident this important trade agreement will pass the Senate soon. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_GJ2PBGkrbE&feature=youtu.be …

The modernized #USMCA includes:
🇺🇸176,000 new #jobs
🇺🇸 More markets for our farmers
🇺🇸 Enforceable environmental & labor standards to help level the playing field
🇺🇸New protections for US digital trade

The #FIGHTFentanyl Act, my bipartisan legislation to permanently criminalize fentanyl-related substances, has already garnered the support from every state’s Attorney General in the US.  https://bit.ly/345yZAk

Overdose deaths across #Ohio due to fentanyl-related substances have deeply impacted our communities. While we have seen some improvement thanks in part to my legislative efforts including #CARA, #STOPAct & #CURES, we can’t take our eye off the ball.

While I’m pleased to have achieved a lot in 2019, there is still a lot more to do. In my column, I discuss how I will continue to be an independent voice for #Ohio to promote common-sense policy solutions for our state.  https://bit.ly/39Evt3J
https://bit.ly/2Vowh4r

There’s still more we must do to strengthen retirement security, which is why I introduced the Retirement Security & Savings Act w/ @SenatorCardin to help Americans save more for retirement, expand access to retirement plans & maximize security and flexibility in retirement.

The #SECUREAct also includes my provision to increase the required minimum distribution age from 70 1/2 to 72, as Americans are living longer & working longer and shouldn’t be penalized for continuing to save their hard-earned $.  https://bit.ly/39Evt3J

The #SECUREAct, now law, includes several provisions I authored to help #Ohioans & all Americans save more for their retirement by encouraging #smallbiz to offer retirement plans to their workers & ensuring millions of part-time employees can access 401(k) plans.
This important legislation is already starting to make a difference for some of our most vulnerable children  in #Ohio.  https://bit.ly/39Evt3J

In 2019, we made some progress in passing legislation to improve health care access. For example, I highlight in my column how @POTUS signed into law our ACE Kids Act to improve health outcomes and care coordination for children on Medicaid w/ complex medical conditions.

The #JOBSAct is a common-sense bill that will help #Ohioans achieve their God-given potential by increasing access to important skills-based training programs so they can have the skills needed for the #jobs available today. Let’s pass it this year.
Businesses are desperate to find these skilled workers and these are good jobs with good benefits.

One of my top priorities in 2020 is working to close the skills gap in #Ohio by passing my #JOBSAct, which will expand access to Pell grants so #Ohioans can afford shorter-term job training programs that will get them meaningful, good-paying #jobs.

By ensuring the Lima plant stays open & successfully securing this funding, we’re helping to safeguard our men and women on the frontlines by giving them the best and most lethal equipment. More in my column:   https://bit.ly/39Evt3J
The #FY2020NDAA funding includes $1.7B to produce needed Abrams tanks & $523M to produce armored Stryker armored vehicles at #JSMC in Lima, plus $394M to upgrade existing Stryker vehicles.
I successfully fought to keep the plant open in 2011 when the Obama admin tried to close it & I’m pleased we secured more funding this year.
I’ve long advocated for the Joint Systems Manufacturing Center in #Lima - America’s tank plant - to ensure they have the resources needed to continue operations.
https://bit.ly/39Evt3J

We successfully fought for Ohio's defense installations &our military families in ‘19. @WrightPattAFB in #Dayton will receive $120M to upgrade its critically important National Air & Space Intelligence Center. In a dangerous world this vital intelligence is all the more important

I also worked to include my Combating Meth & Cocaine Act in the final FY20 funding bill at year end that gives states the flexibility to use federal opioid funding for treatment & recovery services to address the resurgence of meth & cocaine.

The addiction crisis continues to devastate families & loved ones in #Ohio & across our nation. Proud to have helped secure a record grant funding at year end for my #CARA law to ensure we can continue to make a difference in 2020.  https://bit.ly/39Evt3J

In this century, in this country, women, men, and children should not be subjected the horrific crime that is human trafficking & I will continue to help lead efforts in Congress to stop it. #EndItNow

With January being National Human Trafficking Prevention Month it’s time to reflect on what more all of us can do combat this evil crime. Our bipartisan #SESTA law has helped by shutting  down websites that knowingly facilitate selling girls online.
https://bit.ly/39Evt3J

I’m proud that @POTUS signed into law the #SECUREAct, which includes provisions I authored to help more Americans save for their retirement by encouraging #smallbiz to offer retirement plans for their workers & increase the age for required minimum distributions from 70 1/2 to 72

The #FY2020NDAA authorized funding for critical Ohio installations like @WrightPattAFB in Dayton & #JSMC in Lima so they can have the resources needed to complete their missions. Importantly, our servicemembers will see a 3.1% across-the-board pay raise — the largest in a decade.
In my recent column, I highlight how last year I successfully fought for #Ohio’s defense installations & our military families.  https://bit.ly/39Evt3J
The Combating Meth & Cocaine Act gives states the flexibility to use federal opioid funding for treatment & recovery services for these dangerous psychostimulants that are surging across #Ohio.

Last year, I continued to lead efforts in #Congress to tackle the addiction epidemic in #Ohio. I was able to help secure $658M in funding for my bipartisan #CARA grants in 2020 & my Combating Meth and Cocaine Act was signed into law.
I’m proud of all we accomplished last year in Congress to help #Ohioans and their families. More in my recent column:  https://bit.ly/39Evt3J

Monitoring closely the situation in #Iraq. Soleimani has been responsible for the deaths of many Americans over the years & directed the recent attacks on US personnel in the region. Iranian aggression must not go unchecked. I look forward to a full briefing by the administration
I will continue to help lead efforts at the federal level to address addiction as the disease that it is and ensure that those on the frontlines of this epidemic have the resources they need.

It’s also vital that @DHSgov & the #USPS fully implement my bipartisan #STOPAct, which became law last year & requires that all foreign packages from #China & elsewhere provide advanced electronic data to help stop this lethal fentanyl from entering the US via our mail system.

I’ve actively worked to combat the influx of deadly fentanyl in our communities, including introducing the bipartisan #FIGHTFentanylAct, which will permanently criminalize fentanyl-related substances.

Grateful to the Grove City law enforcement for their work in confiscating three kilograms of deadly fentanyl, enough to kill 1.5 million people, back in November. More from @fox8news: https://fox8.com/2019/12/31/man-had-enough-fentanyl-at-ohio-hotel-to-kill-a-million-people-police-say/ …

I’ve long worked on efforts to address homelessness & increase the supply of housing and I’m proud of the strong support for my bipartisan Eviction Crisis Act from national & #Ohio based housing, civil rights and homelessness groups.  https://bit.ly/2PuSqi5

Stable housing is a vital part of getting people back on their feet. My bipartisan Eviction Crisis Act will help to prevent avoidable evictions & make it easier for people to escape poverty by keeping a roof over their heads.  http://bit.ly/2Ea9weD

#USMCA will help level the playing field for American workers, manufacturers & farmers with #Ohio’s two biggest trading partners & I encourage my Senate colleagues to approve this important trade agreement when it comes to a vote on the Senate floor soon.

Good read from @LimaYNN highlighting my support for #USMCA, which the House passed in an overwhelmingly bipartisan fashion last month. This much-needed trade agreement w/ our neighbors, Canada & Mexico will provide a replacement to the 25-year-old #NAFTA. https://www.hometownstations.com/news/portman-sees-usmca-as-a-good-deal-for-ohio/article_743ccaae-2cd6-11ea-9287-5bdd8233c82f.html …
I hope everyone had a truly enjoyable and relaxing holiday season with their loved ones. Jane and I want to wish all #Ohioans a #HappyNewYear!
#HappyNewYear! Looking forward to continuing to work hard for the people of #Ohio in #2020! pic.twitter.com/l4pvFCDgPs
I will continue to work for #Ohio in 2020 by addressing the skills gap through my bipartisan #JOBSAct, improving recycling in our communities w/ my #RECYCLEAct, and more.

Proud of the wins we accomplished for #Ohio in 2019. From protecting our #GreatLakes, combating the addiction epidemic, enhancing our cyber security, strengthening our military installations and more, I’mcommitted to putting #Ohio first.  https://bit.ly/2SHtUfC
